text: Re laetse motho ho ba mosa ho batsoali ba hae: ‘Ma’e o mo imme ka mathata a mo beleha ka bohloko; tlhokomelo ea ngoana ho fihlela a khoesoa ke likhoeli tse mashome a mararo, khabareng ha a fihla lilemo tsa matla a hae, mengoaha e mashome a mane, o re “Oho mong’a nketse hore ke ke be le teboho melemong ea hau eo U nts’itsitseng ka eona, le holima batsoali ba ka bobeli, hore ke tle ke etse ka ho loka, hore U tle U khahloe ke hona; U be le lereko ho ‘na le holima tsoala ea ka. Ruri ke retelehetse ka ho uena, ruri ke ithapalatsa ho uena, Islamong.”
